column5: Please explain what is going on with the PM feature?  I was sending a PM to another member, there was numerous errors, spelling, letters I typed but not displayed?  I feel there is a problem.  Please advise

What browser are you using Wormdunker. I had the same problems sometime back and now again, that's why I asked you to use email rather than PM. I switched to Google Chrome by suggestion of Art then switched back when I got Windows 10 as Chrome caused me bigger problems. Now all of my options here on OFC like Bold, font etc. doesn't work. I love computers, don't you?
I think Wormdunker is using Windows 95.

Nope using windows 8 since I purchased new lap top last June.  I have read too many reports about windows 10 to attempt it.  I'm afraid to try it.  Just like my phone - I've had 3 iphones, I refuse to try another brand - took me a long time to learn iphones!  LOL!
A y chance The ley pare is set to a different language? This iPads default setting is spanish and you end up with Messags lime this.
I sent a PM this morning & everything worked properly.
Good old W10, royal pain. I hear the global climate change is now blamed on Windows 10...lol my video program will not run now on it so now I need to dig out an old puter
I had numerous issues with this site until I finally, kicking and screaming, switched over to Mozilla Firefox as my browser.  All of the issues went away.  And I have Windows 10 too.........  Doug
I liked 8 better. It had issues but don't they all do? My brother has a Mac and he doesn't think it's worth the extra bucks. What ever happened to poor Windows 9? You PC nuts know the answer.

Nope using windows 8 since I purchased new lap top last June.  I have read too many reports about windows 10 to attempt it.  I'm afraid to try it.  Just like my phone - I've had 3 iphones, I refuse to try another brand - took me a long time to learn iphones!  LOL! I'm not sure if you followed any of the other threads on Win10 but microsoft is forcing the upgrades on many user of 7 and 8. I suggest running a utility called never10 to block the upgrade.  Cheers
10 is good,with Mozzila,not sure why all the problems?,nothing here at all for months.

My phone is easy. I type in the number that I want to talk to and they say "Hello". That's how I use it. The old fashioned way. My wife can talk into it and a text message is typed out. I just call the person. Does this phone of mine do other stuff I don't need to know like tell me I'm lost, again? Now if could cut the grass I might do more with it.
Hey there OIM, when did you change the picture on your handle?  I am going WAYYYY out on a limb here but I am guessing that is not YOU in the picture!  Doug
